(Simplified: 骊)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 麗 indicates the sound; 馬 (horse) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 馬 [ mǎ ] horse; surname
    • 麗 [ lì ] beautiful, elegant, magnificent
①純黑色的馬。
②傳說中黑色的龍：驪珠。
③並列：“驪駕四鹿”。
驪山 [ lí shān ]: Mt Li near Xi'an with the tomb of the First Emperor
驪姬之亂 [ lí jī zhī luàn ]: Li Ji Rebellion in 657-651 BC, where concubine Li Ji tried to throne her son but was eventually defeated by Duke Wen of Jin 晋文公
(Simplified: 骊)

Pictophonetic: 麗 indicates the sound; 馬 (horse) conveys the meaning.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning a pure black horse.

驪字的基本解释

驪
lí
见“骊”。

驪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lí］
［《廣韻》吕支切，平支，來。］
［《廣韻》郎溪切，平齊，來。］
“骊1”的繁体字。
(1)深黑色的马。
(2)黑色。参见“驪色”、“驪黑”。
(3)骊龙的省称。
(4)骊山的省称。参见“驪岫”、“驪墳”。
(5)《骊驹》的省称。
(6)通“麗”。附丽；并列。
(7)姓。参见“驪姬”。
[②]［chí］
［《集韻》陳尼切，平脂，澄。］
“骊2”的繁体字。
见“驪2靬”。

驪字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　驪； 康熙笔画：29； 页码：页1447第18
【唐韻】呂支切【集韻】【韻會】鄰知切，?音離。【玉篇】盜驪，千里馬也。【爾雅·釋畜】小領盜驪。【註】郭註《穆天子傳》曰天子之駿盜驪，綠耳，又曰右服盜驪。【詩·齊風】四驪濟濟。【禮·檀弓】夏后氏尚黑，戎事乗驪。又【月令】冬駕鐵驪。　又駕兩馬曰驪。【後漢·寇恂傳】光武北征時，軍食急乏，寇恂以輦車驪駕轉輸，前後不絕。【註】驪駕，倂駕也。　又山名。【後漢·郡國志】京兆尹新豐有驪山。【註】杜預曰：古驪戎國。韋昭曰：戎成居此山，故號驪戎。　又高句驪，國名。　又縣名。【前漢·地理志】右北平郡驪成縣。　又【廣韻】郞奚切【韻會】憐題切【正韻】鄰溪切，?音黎。義同。　又【集韻】陳尼切，音馳。驪靬，縣名。【前漢·地理志】張掖郡驪靬縣。【註】李奇曰：音遲虔。師古曰：驪，力遲反。靬音虔。令其土俗人呼驪靬，疾言之曰力虔。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋畜】小領盜驪。【註】周穆王八駿有盜驪。盜驪，竊驪也。竊淺靑色，驪純黑色。〕　謹按周穆王云云與爾雅註

Traditional characters for "骊1".
(1) A dark black horse.
(2) Black. See "li color", "li black".
(3) The provincial name of Lilong.
(4) The provincial name of Lishan. See "Lixiu", "Lifen".
(5) The provincial title of "Liju".
(6) Through "Li". Attached to Li; tied.
(7) Last name. See "Li Ji".
[②]［chí］
["Ji Yun" Chen Niche, Pingzhi, Cheng. ]
Traditional characters for "骊2".
See "Li 2 靬".
Li
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　Li; Kangxi Strokes: 29; Page Number: Page 1447 Page 18
[Tang Yun] Lv Zhiqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Neighbors know and cut,? The sound is separated. [Jade articles] Stealing Li, Qian Li Ma also. 【Erya·Shihu】Little collar thief Li. [Note] Guo's note in "Mu Tianzi Biography" said that the emperor's horse robbers Li, with green ears, and also said that the right suit robbers Li. 【Poetry·Qi Feng】Four lilies are in great numbers. [Li·Tan Gong] The Xiahou clan is still black, and the army takes advantage of Li. And [monthly order] winter driving iron li.　 drove two more horses and said Li. [The Story of Kou Xun in the Later Han Dynasty] During the Guangwu Northward Expedition, the army was in anxious food, and Kou Xun relied on his chariots to transfer and lose. [Note] Li Jia, Yi Jia also.　Also the name of the mountain. [Later Han·Gun Guozhi] Jingzhao Yin Xinfeng has Lishan. [Note] Du Yu said: Ancient Lirong State. Wei Zhao said: Rong Cheng lives in this mountain, hence the name Li Rong.　 Gao Juli, the name of the country.　Also the county name. [Former Han Geography] Licheng County, Youbeiping County.　[Guang Yun] Yan Xiqie [Yun Hui] Lian Qieqi [Zheng Yun] Near Xiqie,? Yin Li. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Chen Niche, Yinchi. Lili, the county name. [Pre-Han Geography] Lilu County, Zhangye County. [Note] Li Qi said: Yinchiqian. Shi Gu said: Li, the strength is late. Qianyinqian. To make the native people call Lili, the quick word is called Liqian. Textual research: [[Erya·Shihu] Xiaoling Pirate Li. [Note] Zhou Mu Wang's Eight Horses have stolen Li. Steal Li, steal Li also. Stealing light color, pure black. 〕 　 Please note Zhou Mu Wang Yunyun and Erya
